summary: pteropine orthoreovirus (PRV) isolated from monkey faecal samples. two virus isolates were retrieved by virus culture of 55 monkey faecal samples. RT-PCR showed that PRV was detected in 10.9% (6/55) and HEV was detected in 25.5% of the monkey faecal samples. sequences of primers for the orthoreovirus whole-genome sequencing. DOC 85 kb.

pteropine orthoreovirus (PRV) isolated from monkey faecal samples. two virus isolates were retrieved by virus culture of 55 monkey faecal samples. RT-PCR showed that PRV was detected in 10.9% (6/55) and HEV was detected in 25.5% of the monkey faecal samples. sequences of primers for the orthoreovirus whole-genome sequencing. DOC 85 kb.
